video.title: Hi Opie!
video.synopsis: Emphasizing education through play, this live-action series follows lovable puppet Opie as he navigates kindergarten alongside his human classmates.

episodes.synopsis: Opie gets chosen as the classroom special helper; Opie and Porter don't want to stop playing; Opie can't decide which fun thing to do first!
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Opie is excited to present his new toy to the class at show-and-tell; Opie gets to play a musical instrument; Opie is excited for Monster Day.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Samara pretend to be ancient Egyptian royalty; Opie has a new game he wants to play; Opie and Amanye's space mission is stalled.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Opie turns into his new favorite superhero, Eco-Hero; Opie thinks he knows everything about life under the sea after a trip to the aquarium.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Gavin try to find all the things they have in common; Opie trades his lucky button for a marble; Opie gets really excited to recite a poem.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Jonathan gives a lesson on making a glow-in-the-dark comet; Opie builds a space station; Opie worries that anything he can do, Porter can do better.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Sahnya work together to invent a sorting game; Opie has a substitute teacher; Opie wants to play with two of his friends at the same time.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Opie makes a mess of his classmates' shoes; Opie wants to make a friendship bracelet for Samara; Opie's excited to sing a song but gets the hiccups.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: It's Food from Around the World Day; Opie brings his invisible friend to kindergarten; when Opie’s artwork goes missing, he decides to play detective.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Opie shares his love of leaves with Sahnya; Opie tries to cheer up Corinne; Opie imagines he's a rock star when Porter's rocker dad visits the class.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Opie tries to make indoor recess as much fun as outdoor recess; Opie and his classmates play restaurant; Opie and Porter open competing stores.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Samara go on a treasure hunt; Opie wants to play with the dinosaurs; Opie is thrilled when he discovers a new game Ms. Doney was saving.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When Logan gets sick, Opie worries Ms. Doney won't spend time with him; Opie makes lots of mistakes; Samara wants to act out "Hansel and Gretel."
episodes.title: Episode 13
